Marcela, se dedica a la venta de tostadas y de pupusas, ella vive con su madre, es madre soltera de un pequeño de dos años de edad; Marcela lleva 4 años dedicándose a la venta de pupusas y tostadas, el negocio lo aprendió de su madre y hoy en día es el medio de ingreso que tiene para sobrellevar la responsabilidad familiar.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de materiales para la elaboración de pupusas y tostadas, lo que necesita es aceite, maíz, condimentos, plátano verde, estos son los productos que comprara, para mantener la disponibilidad y en un momento dado aumentar la producción.
El objetivo de Marcela es mejorar el negocio, a través del aporte de los préstamos, ofreciéndole a su familia una vida más estable.
texts.en:
Marcela sells tostadas and pupusas.  She lives with her mother and is a single mother of a little two-year-old boy.  Marcela has been selling pupusas and tostadas for four years.  She learned the business from her mother and today it’s her means of support to meet her family responsibility.

At present, she’s asking for a loan to buy ingredients to make pupusas and tostadas.  What she needs is oil, corn, condiments and green plantain.  These are the products she’ll buy to have stock available and increase production.  Marcela’s objective is to provide her family with a more stable life through the loans.

loans.use: to buy oil, corn, condiments and green plantain.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy diesel fuel.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy special bread, onions, tomatoes, dressing, meats, condiments and soft-drinks.

loans.name: Maria Berfalia

texts.es:
María, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo, debido a saldar ya casi en su totalidad en préstamo anterior, por lo que está interesada por comprar mercadería para el negocio, como uvas, fresas, melocotón, ciruelas, para poder aumentar la variedad en el negocio.
Para María considera que el negocio ha aumentado su rentabilidad, ya que lo ha mantenido surtido de frutas frescas.
texts.en: María decided on a new loan because she’s almost completely repaid her previous one and she’s interested in buying merchandise for the business like grapes, strawberries, peaches and plums to increase variety.  María feels that her business' profitability has increased since she’s had it supplied with fresh fruit.

loans.use: to buy grapes, strawberries, peaches and plums.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Banco Comunal Cristo Nos Ama Group

texts.es: Candida Azucena, Ramona, Dominga, Armando, María, Ramona, Zoyla, Iris, Cleto y Silvia. La señora Silvia se dedica a elaboración y venta de tortillas, desde hace más de 4 años que tiene este negocio, ella tiene una gran cantidad de clientes que llegan a comprar sus productos. Es por eso que solicita este crédito para la compra de maíz, cal, leña, bolsas, entre otros productos ella se encuentra muy contenta con este medio de vida. Todas las personas que conforman el banco se encuentran contentos por esta oportunidad.
texts.en: Cándida Azucena, Ramona, Dominga, Armando, María, Ramona, Zoyla, Iris, Cleto and Silvia makes and sells tortillas.  The business has been in operation four years.  She has quite a number of customers that come by to buy her products.  Because of this she’s asking for a loan to buy corn, lime powder, firewood and bags, among other products.  She feels very happy with this way of life.  All the members of the bank are happy for the opportunity.

loans.use: to buy corn, lime powder, firewood and bags, among other products.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase clothing for women, boys and girls

loans.name: Giselle María

texts.es:
La  Señora Giselle Maria tiene 23 años de edad, es casada, tiene un hijo, vive en  la Comunidad de Agualote, Municipio de Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara. Su esposo trabaja de operario en una empresa maquiladora.
Comenzó su negocio de venta de alimentos hace 3 años, con el propósito de obtener otros ingresos y apoyar la economía familiar.
Doña Giselle ha solicitado un crédito para la compra de insumos y utensilios de cocina para la preparación de los alimentos. Ella espera que sus ventas aumenten ya que con los utensilios que comprara podrá realizar la preparación de los alimentos de manera más rápida.
Con los ingresos que ha obtenido logro mejorar su vivienda y ayudar a su hijo con la educación escolar.
Para el futuro planea destinar sus utilidades en la construcción de un local propio, ya que actualmente alquila.
texts.en:
Giselle Maria, age 23, is married and has one child.  She lives in the Agualote community in the Azacualpa municipality, Santa Bárbara.  Her husband works in an assembly plant.

She started her business of selling food three years ago.  Her intention was to get other income and to financially support the family.

Giselle has requested a loan to buy supplies and kitchen utensils to prepare food.  She hopes that her sales will increase.  With the utensils that she will buy she will be able to prepare the food more rapidly.

With the income she has received she has managed to improve her house and to help her son with his education.  In the future she plans to use her profits to build her own place because she currently rents.

loans.use: to buy supplies and kitchen utensils.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase milk for making cheese and sour cream

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase firewood and perishables

loans.name: Rosa María

texts.es: La señora Rosa María es madre de 3 hijas jóvenes entre 13 y 20 años una ya se encuentra casada pero aun así no deja de ir a verla. Para Rosa es muy importante ofrecer a sus hijas una mejor calidad de vida, por ello hace 4 años inicio con su negocio de ropa usada y zapatos al frente de su casa y algunas veces en una colonia de la ciudad. El esposo y ella trabajan en maquiladora 10 horas diarias para obtener un ingreso fijo y poder cubrir los gastos del hogar. Rosa María quiere comprar ropa de temporada como suéteres, blusas de manga larga, pantaloneras, chaquetas de esta manera estará preparada para el invierno.
texts.en: Rosa María is the mother of 3 young daughters between the ages of 13 and 20. One is married already but even so she still goes to see her. For Rosa it is very important to offer her daughters a better quality of life. Because of this, she started a used clothing and shoes  business 4 years ago in front of her house and sometimes in a neighborhood in town. She and her husband work in factory 10 hours a day to have a steady income and cover the household expenses. Rosa María wants to buy seasonal clothing such as sweaters, blouses, long sleeved shirts, pants, and jackets. In this way she will be preparing for winter.

loans.use: to buy seasonal winter clothing

loans.name: Olga Lidia

texts.es: Olga Odilia es una señora muy trabajadora y dedicada, desD. hace 3 años inicio su negocio D. cooperativa en una escuela D. la ciudad, donD. ofrece variedad D. productos como lo es dulces, refrescos, jugos, tacos, gorditas, sándwich y platillos que ofrece a los alumnos y maestros del plantel. Para Odilia es mu importante tener su negocio bien surtido ya que esa escuela cuenta mas 300 estudiantes y diario el producto que ofrece se le termina. Por tal motivo solicita D. un préstamo para comprar mas D. mercancía como lo es botanas, dulces, refrescos y materia primara para elaboración D. la comida  D. esta manera obtendrá mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Olga Odilia is a very hardworking and dedicated woman. Three years ago, she started her own cooperative business in a school in the city. There she offers a variety of products such as candies, beverages, juices, tacos, gorditas, sandwiches and snacks that she offers the students and teachers. For Odilia it is very important to have her business well stocked since the school has more than 300 students and every day she runs out of the products she has. For that reason, she is asking for the loan to buy more merchandise such as snacks, candies, beverages, and ingredients to make food. In this way, she will obtain more earnings.

loans.use: to buy snacks, beverages, and ingredients to make food.

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es: María de los Ángeles es una mujer muy dedicada que la mayoría del tiempo se la pasa en su trabajo, como promotora de harina de maíz que misma acomoda en los estantes de una tienda comercial. En este momento se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un préstamo para mandar dinero a su mama que se encuentra enferma y no cuenta con el dinero necesario para pagar el hospital. María de los Ángeles se preocupa por el bienestar de us mama  y quiere recompensar de alguna manera todo lo que le dio durante su infancia y juventud hablando de cosas materiales como los alimentación, un techo donde vivir cómodamente, educación y lo mas importante el amor.
texts.en:
María de los Ángeles is a very dedicated woman who spends the majority of time at her job selling cornmeal that she herself puts on the shelves of a commercial store.

At the moment she finds it necessary to request a loan to send money to her mother who is sick and doesn't have the necessary money to pay for the hospital.

María de los Ángeles is worried about her mother's well-being and wants to pay her back somehow for everything that she did for her during her childhood and youth, speaking of material things such as food, a roof over her head, and education, as well as the most important thing, love.

loans.use: to pay hospital expenses.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es: El señor Gregorio es un hombre muy trabajador y emprendedor, desde hace 40 años inicio su negocio que es una estética que ha ofrecido el mejor servicio a su clientela y sobre todo experiencia. Desde joven se dedico al estilismo el cual junto dinero para comprar su propio local en el que fuera suyo y no tener que pagar renta y ser su propio jefe. En este momento el se intereso en un préstamo para comprar tintes, planchas alaciadoras, peróxidos, guantes y mas, ya que comenta que se viene la temporada de quinceañeras, bodas, posadas y graduaciones y quiere estar preparado con material de trabajo.
texts.en: Gregorio is a hardworking, enterprising man.  He started his beauty salon 40 years ago and offers his customers the best service and above all experience.  Since a very young age he’s been in hair styling and he saved up money to buy his own locale so as not to pay rent and to be his own boss.  At present, he’s interested in a loan to buy hair color, straightening combs, peroxide, gloves and others because he comments that the season for fifteen-year-old parties, weddings, Christmas festivities and graduations is approaching and he wants to be prepared with work supplies.

loans.use: to buy hair color and equipment for the salon.

loans.name: Bernadette

texts.en:
Bernadette resides in an urban place but lives less fortunate. She could not find good employment, so she decided to engage herself in the business of a sari-sari (variety) store selling grocery items. She has been operating this business for 10 years. 

Bernadette is now 36 years old and has two children that need daily allowances and meals. She is now asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy more grocery items, such as biscuits, eggs, vinegar, soy sauce, milk, and sugar to sell in her store.

Bernadette would like to keep growing as a successful entrepreneur and someday lift her family out of poverty.

loans.use: to buy more grocery items, such as biscuits, eggs, vinegar, soy sauce, milk, and sugar to sell in her store.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.en:
Gregoria had been patiently operating her sari-sari (variety) store business for almost ten years.  With her experience in retail business she has encountered many problems especially when crisis occurred and she allowed credit on some of the items in her store.  She wants to stock more grocery items but due to inadequate funds she is now asking for a loan to buy vinegar, cooking oil, sugar, milk, coffee and soft drinks to sell in her store. These additional items would help increase her sales.  She is asking an amount of P15,000. 

Gregoria is now 53 years old, married and has two grown-up children.  She usually earns P3,000 each month and uses it as revolving capital to continuously operate the business.  The rest of the income is used to pay electricity bills and pay for her family's daily meals.

In the future Gregoria hopes to earn consistent profits to save enough funds for her future expenses.

loans.use: to buy vinegar, cooking oil, sugar, milk, coffee and soft drinks to sell in her store.

loans.name: William

texts.en:
William is responsible for all kinds of bicycle repairs in their village.  He is 57 years old, married and has six children, who attend school.  He is patiently involved in this kind of business to provide a good education for his children.  William has been in this business for almost ten years.  He usually earns about P2,000.  According to him, it is just enough to cover his daily expenses and his children's allowances.

William is now asking for a loan amount of P10,000 to buy more tools such as screws, cutters and tyre sets to use in his repair shop. 

In the future he wants to improve his repair services to acquire more customers and thus increase his earnings.

loans.use: to buy more tools such as screws, cutters and tyre sets to use in his repair shop.

loans.name: Oyunbileg

texts.en:
Mrs Oyunbileg, 42, sells leather gloves and eyeglasses in the market.  She rents a bulk and pays USD 350 for renting.  Since 2000 she has been doing her business non-stop and has gained a lot of experience in the selling business.  

She lives with her two sons and her husband in the suburban area of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. 

Recently the bulk renting cost has increased by over USD 100 on account of a high increase in inflation.  Due to this she needs to raise her business income, as well as expand it further.  She is planning to purchase a larger number of commodities from her suppliers from this month on according her plan.  The loan she is taking will be dedicated to purchasing sales commodities such as leather gloves and eyeglasses to increase her working capital.

loans.use: To purchase sales commodities such as leather gloves and eyeglasses to increase her working capital.

loans.name: Uranchimeg

texts.en:
Mrs. Uranchimeg, 46, works as a technician in the maintenance department of Mongolian National Broadcasting Television. She has been doing her job for 25 years and is an elder officer. She lives with her family in the suburban district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. 

She married and moved to a new apartment with her family, and they are still using their initial furniture. The furniture has became very old and damaged. Therefore, she decided to buy new furniture for her home. She needs over MNT 2.000.000 to buy the furniture. The loan she is taking will be used to purchase some new furniture to renovate her home.

loans.use: to purchase some new furniture to renovate her home

loans.name: Ravshankul

texts.ru: Равшанкул женат и отец 3 детей. С детства он интересовался агро- бизнесом, его отец работал агрономом . Он тщательно наблюдал за  работой своего отца и изучил секреты данного бизнеса от отца. А потом, когда он вырос, он открыл свой бизнес и более 11 лет продолжает дело и имеет богатый опыт. С получаемой прибыли он хочет ремонтировать свой дом и улучшить благосостояния семьи. Равшанкул хотел бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Ravshankul is married and is a father of three children.  He has been interested in the agricultural business since childhood, when his father worked as an agronomist.  Ravshankul meticulously watched his father work and learned the business secrets from his father.  As an adult, Ravshankul then opened his own business, has been running it for 11 years and gained an extensive experience in it.  He wants to use his resulting profit to make repairs to his house and improve his family's livelihood.  Ravshankul wants to obtain this loan to purchase mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Kholida

texts.ru: Более двух лет Холида занимается выращиванием пшеницы. Она активная и трудолюбивая незамужняя девушка. Она хочет расширить свой бизнес и максимизировать свой прибыль и купить себе швейную машинку, чтобы заниматься шитьем в сводное время, ведь это приносит ей дополнительный доход. Холида хотела бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений и семян.
texts.en: Kholida has been growing wheat for over two years. She is an energetic and hard-working single woman. She would like to expand her business and maximize her profits and buy as sewing machine in order to do sewing in her spare time, since this brings her additional income. Kholida would like to obtain a loan to buy mineral fertilizers and seeds.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Tuichi

texts.ru: Туйчи женат и имеет 3 детей. Он занимается откормом скота и выращиванием пшеницы более 7 лет. Он опытный и профессионал в своем деле. Ему помогает сын и жена, они сеют пшеницу и получают хороший доход каждый год. Прибыль, который получает от продажи пшеницы он хочет построит хлев для скота. Туйчи хотел бы получить займ для покупки семян картошки и пшеницы, а также ядохимикатов.
texts.en: Tuichi is married and has three children.  He has been involved in fattening up livestock and growing wheat for over seven years.  He is an experienced professional in his business.  His son and wife help him by growing wheat, and together they earn a good income every income.  Tuichi wants to use he profit that he gets from the sales of wheat to build a barn for his livestock.  Tuichi wants to obtain this loan for the purchase of potato and wheat seeds and also pesticides.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and pesticides

loans.name: Akylbek

texts.ru:
Акылбек 36-летний фермер, живущий в со своей семьей с двумя сыновьями семи и пяти лет в селе Ой- Тал (северо-восточная часть Кыргызстана). В поисках источника дохода, в 1996 года Акылбек начал свой бизнес в разведении скота, выращивании и перепродаже сельхоз продукции.  На участке Акылбека имеются яблони и грушевые деревья, а также особое внимание он уделяет культивированию и выращиванию особого сорта картофеля, пользующегося повышенным спросом у местного населения. Упорный и неустанный труд в бизнесе позволяет Акылбеку покрывать расходы своей семьи и хозяйства, а  также  планировать  будущее для своих детей.
Для дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Акылбек обратился в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) для закупа дополнительного поголовья скота для откорма. Планируемую прибыль Акылбек намерен использовать для закупа кормов и сена на зиму, чтобы весной начать перепродажу скота.
texts.en: Akylbek is a 36 year-old farmer, living with his family and two sons, who are seven and five years old, in the the Oi-Tal village (north-eastern part of Kyrgyzstan).  In search of a source of income, Akylbek started his own business of breeding livestock, growing and reselling agricultural crops in 1996.  Akylbek has apple and pear trees on his plot of land and also devotes special attention to cultivating and growing a particular variety of potatoes that is in higher demand among the local residents.  His persistent and tireless labor in the business allows Akylbek to cover his family's and household expenses and also to plan his children's future.  In order to further increase his livestock quantity, Akylbek requested a loan in the sum of 80,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy additional livestock headcount for fattening up.  He plans to use the planned profit for the purchase of fodder and hay for the winter, so that he can start reselling livestock in the spring.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Junie

texts.en: Junie, 45 years old, is married, and they are blessed with five children. Three of his children are currently in school. Junie has been growing corn for almost 35 years. Last growing season his net income was 18,000 PHP. He's asking for a loan of 30,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers and seedlings for his farm. His future loans from KIVA would be very helpful to him as he sees the loans as the only chance for the development of his business and financial security.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and seedlings for his farm

loans.name: Gerry

texts.en:
With his desire to improve his family's living situation, Gerry has devoted himself full-time to his corn farm business for 25 years. He is 41 years old and is married to a business minded woman. They have five children. His wife works in her sari-sari (convenience) store and sometimes she sells different kinds of fish in the local community. They work hard to give their children a good quality of life and to lift them out of poverty.

Now, he is requesting a loan of PHP 50,000 to purchase seedlings and fertilizers for his corn farm business. He hopes to grow and increase his yield with the help of this loan.

loans.use: to purchase seedlings and fertilizers for his corn farm business

loans.name: Ilhomjon

texts.ru: Илхомджон более 12 лет имеет богатый опыт в сфере сельском хозяйстве и успешен в своем деле. Он занимается выращиванием пшеницы, а также откормом скота. Он очень трудолюбивый человек и усердно работает ради улучшения жизни семьи. А также он выращивает корову и овца, а потом продает за выгодную цену. Илхомджон хочет улучшить благосостояние семьи и проводить свадьбу сына. С этой целью он старается расширить свой бизнес и максимизировать свою прибыль. Илхомджон хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота и семян.
texts.en: Ilhomjon has been involved in an agricultural business for over 12 years, has an extensive experience and is successful in his business.  He is involved in growing wheat and also fattening up livestock.  He is a very hardworking person, who works diligently to improve his family's life.  Ilhomjon also raises cattle and sheep and then sells them at a profitable price.  Ilhomjon wants to improve his family's livelihood and hold a wedding for his son.  With this goal in mind, he tries to expand his business and maximize his profit.  Ilhomjon wants to obtain this loan for the purchase of livestock and seeds.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and seeds

loans.name: Gandaria 2 Group

texts.en:
Dahlia is 35 years old and married with three children. She began her business selling snacks five years ago but this is her first loan with VisionFund Indonesia. She sells snacks from her house and thus far it has been profitable and supplements her husband's income. 

The loan will help her increase her stock of snacks to resell so hopefully her income can increase. She hopes that her children can stay in school and can eventually attend college because she was only given the chance to finish high school.

loans.use: to buy more snacks such as cookies and cakes to resell

loans.name: Cesar Aníbal

texts.es: Cesar Aníbal de veintisiete años de edad vive con su madre y hermanos en casa propia. El posee una tienda donde comercia todo tipo de productos, últimamente se ha hecho de mas clientela pues el negocio está ubicado en un lugar estratégico de la zona donde residen, además que los artículos son de excelente  calidad a precios  accesibles; Cesar es un hombre trabajador con grandes metas para el futuro. El piensa que éxito nunca llega solo, hay que trabajar arduamente para conseguirlo es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar lácteos, embutidos, granos básicos, bebidas, golosinas etc. Cesar Aníbal tiene fe que así lograra darle una vida plena a su familia.
texts.en:
Cesar Aníbal, 27, lives with his mother and sibling in his own house.  He has a store where he sells all types of products.  He’s acquired more customers lately because the store is located in a very strategic spot in the neighborhood where he lives; besides the products are of excellent quality and have affordable prices.

Cesar is a hard worker with big goals for the future.  He thinks that success doesn’t just come by, one has to work hard to achieve it and that’s why he’s asking Integral for a loan to buy dairy products, cured meats, basic grains, beverages, snacks, etc. Cesar Aníbal has faith that he will manage to give his family a full life this way.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Aubreey Haydee

texts.es: Aubreey Haydee  D. treinta y tres años D. edad vive con su compañero D. vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una papelería donD. venD. variedad D. artículos papel, hojas, lapiceros, plumones entre otros, esta es muy conocida en la zona pues las personas siempre encuentran ahí todo lo que necesitan con producto D. calidad y a un buen precio además el servicio es excelente; Aubreey es una mujer dedicada a su trabajo el amor y la constancia son sus mayores secretos,  ella piensa  que por muy alta que sea una colina siempre hay un sendero hacia su cima, busca el camino del éxito es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar papel en variedad, lapiceros, plumones, globos y otros artículos. Aubreey Haydee tiene la confianza que con su esfuerzo lograra darle a su familia una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
Aubreey Haydee, 33, lives with her life’s companion and their children in a house she owns.  She has a stationery shop where she sells a variety of paper goods, sheets of paper, pencils and markets, among others.  She is very well known in her zone because people always find what they are looking for there and the products are good quality at affordable prices; besides service is excellent.

Aubreey is a woman dedicated to her work; love and constancy are her biggest secrets.  She thinks that no matter how high a hill might be there’s always a path to the top and she looks for the path to success.  This is why she’s asking Integral for a loan that will make it possible for her to buy an assortment of paper, pencils, markers, balloons and other things.  She trusts that with her effort she will manage to proviD. her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy assorted paper, pencils, markers, balloons and other things.

loans.name: Balmore

texts.es: Balmore de cuarenta y uno años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. El posee un taller de estructuras metálicas, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues su trabajo es de excelente calidad y a un buen precio; Balmore es un hombre trabajador  siempre está muy activo y es constante en su labor, piensa que el éxito se alcanza convirtiendo cada paso en una meta y cada meta en un paso es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar metal y otras herramientas que le permitan realizar al máximo su trabajo. Balmore tiene fe que con su esfuerzo y dedicación lograra llevar a su hogar seguridad económica y una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en: Balmore, 41, lives with his life’s companion and their children in his own house.  He has a metal shop and has acquired many customers because his work is of excellent quality and is well priced.  Balmore is a hardworking man who is always very active and constant in his work.  He thinks that success is achieved turning each step into a goal and every goal into a step and this is why he’s asking Integral for a loan to buy metal and other tools that will allow him to optimize his work.  Balmore trusts that with his effort and dedication he will bring economic security to his home and improve his family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy metal at wholesale and other tools.

loans.name: Yaneth Argelia

texts.es: Yaneth Argelia D. veintiocho años D. edad vive junto a su compañero D. vida y sus hijos. Ella posee una tienda donD. venD. artículos D. primera necesidad,  se ha hecho D. mucha clientela últimamente pues ella siempre tiene lo que ellos necesitan con productos D. primera calidad a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es inigualable. Yaneth es conocida por ser una mujer entregada a su trabajo siempre dispuesta a mejorar, piensa que para lograr grandes cosas se necesita estar convencido D. querer el éxito, quiere cumplir sus metas es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar producto instantáneo, granos básicos, golosinas, bebidas, jabones etc. Yaneth Argelia tiene la esperanza que D. esta forma lograra darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Yaneth Argelia, 28, lives with her life companion and their children.  She has a store where she sells staple goods.  She’s acquired many customers lately because she always has what they need in stock with quality products at very affordable prices; besides the service is unequalled.  

Yaneth is known for being a woman who is devoted to her work and always willing to improve.  She believes that in order to attain great things one needs to be convinced of wanting to be successful.  She wants to reach her goals and this is why she’s asked Integral for a loan to buy instant products, basic grains, snacks, soft-drinks, soap, etc.  Yaneth hopes that she’ll be able to proviD. a fulfilled life for her family this way.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Shohimardon

texts.ru: Шохимардон ответственный и добросовестный человек. Он женат и любящий отец 2 детей. Более 13 лет он занимается купле- продажей скот. Его жена помогает ему в бизнесе. Он покупает скота на местных рынках и откармливает их, а когда они набирает вес, потом продает за выгодную цену. Кроме этого он занимается выращиванием пшеницы. Отходы от выращивания уходит на корм скота. Так как Шохмардон имеет свою землю, он хочет купить скот и содержать их за счет выращенного своего корма, которые производит на своей земле.
texts.en: Shohimardon is a responsible and honest man. He is married and is a loving father of two children. He has been buying and selling cattle for more than thirteen years. His wife helps him with the business. He buys cattle on the local markets, then feeds it and when they have gained weight he sells them at a profitable price. He also grows wheat. The waste from growing wheat goes towards feeding the cattle. Because Shohmardon has his own land he wants to buy cattle to sustain it by growing his own fodder which he produces on his own land.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Ana Bilma

texts.es: Ana Bilma D. cuarenta y siete años D. edad vive con su compañero D. vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una venta D. bisutería y algunos artículos D. ropa, se ha hecho D. mucha clientela pues  siempre está a la orden D. las necesidades D. las personas; Ana es una mujer emprendedora con ganas D. salir adelante, siempre está dispuesta a trabajar, piensa que no hay nada inaccesible para el que está dispuesto a alcanzar el éxito y Ana está totalmente dispuesta, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar artículos D. bisutería, calcetines, blusas y otros. Ana Bilma tiene la confianza que D. esta forma lograra llevar a su hogar seguridad económica y una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en: Ana Bilma, 47, lives with her life companion and their children in her own house.  She sells costume jewelry and some articles of clothing.  She has many customers because she’s always ready to meet people’s needs.  Ana is an enterprising woman who very much wants to get ahead.  She’s always willing to work and believes that there is nothing inaccessible for she who is willing to reach success and Ana is totally willing.  Because of this she’s asking Integral for a loan to buy costume jewelry, socks, blouses and others.  Ana Bilma trusts that she will be able to bring economic security and a better quality of life to her home this way.

loans.use: to buy costume jewelry, socks, blouses and others.

loans.name: Habibullo

texts.ru: Более 26 лет Хабибулло занимается откормом скота и выращиванием сельхозкультур. Он очень трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек. Его любящая жена помогает ему в бизнесе. Хабибулло выращивает пшеницу и  морковь. Иногда его дети помогает на переработки земли и посева семян. Хабибулло хочет улучшить свое жилищное условия и расширить свой бизнес. Он хочет приобрести скот и семена с целью расширения бизнеса. С этой целью он запрашивает займ в размере 7000 Сомони. Он заранее благодарен вам за вашу доброту и помощь.
texts.en: Habibullo has been involved in fattening up livestock and growing agricultural crops for over 26 years.  He is a very hardworking and goal-oriented person.  Habibullo's loving wife helps him in this business.  He grows wheat and carrots.  Sometimes, his children helps him with plowing the land and sowing seeds.  Habibullo wants to improve his living conditions and expand his business.  He wants to buy livestock and seeds in order to expand his business.  He is requesting a loan in the sum of 7000 Somoni for this purpose.  Habibullo is grateful to you for your kindness and help.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and seeds

loans.name: María Isabel

texts.es: María Isabel de treinta y uno años de edad vive con sus hijos. Ella posee una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, frijoles, leche entre otros, su negocio es muy conocido en la zona pues es el más surtido de mercadería, las personas siempre encuentran lo que necesitan con artículos de calidad, a un buen precio y con una atención excelente; María es una mujer muy activa siempre se encuentra enfocada en su trabajo le gusta mantenerse al frente de la competencia para ella los que siempre miran para adelante con positivismo y entrega son los grandes triunfadores, es así con ese pensamiento positivo como se ha decidido a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar productos como granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, pan, bebidas, jabones etc. María Isabel tiene fe que con su esfuerzo lograra darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Isabel, 31, lives with her children.  She has a store where she sells basic staples like rice, beans and milk, among others.  Her store is very well known in the zone because it’s the best stocked and people always find what they need with quality products at good prices with excellent service.  

María is a very active woman who is always focused on work; she likes to stay ahead of the competition.   She believes that those who always look ahead with a positive attitude and dedication are the great successes.  It’s with this positive attitude that she decided to ask Integral for a loan to buy basic grains, instant products, snacks, bread, beverages, soap, etc.  María Isabel trusts that she’ll manage a better quality of life for her family with her effort.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Marta Lidia

texts.es: Marta Lidia D. cincuenta y nueve años D. edad vive con su compañero D. vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una venta D. ollas y cacerolas D. todo tipo, es muy conocida en la localidad donD. tiene el negocio pues el producto que comercia es D. muy buena calidad y a un excelente precio, sus ventas siempre satisfacen a la clientela; Marta es una mujer llena D. metas por cumplir y pone su mejor esfuerzo para llegar a un triunfo en el futuro, piensa que al éxito no se le encuentra, si no se le busca incansablemente y ella lo está buscando es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ollas por mayor. Marta Lidia tiene la esperanza que con el arduo trabajo lograra darle a su familia una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en:
Marta Lidia, 59, lives with her life partner and their children in a house of her own.  She sells pots and pans of all sorts.  She’s very well known in the locality where her business is because the products she sells are very good quality and sell for an excellent price; her customers are always satisfied with their purchases.

Marta is a woman with many goals to meet and she puts her best effort into succeeding in the future.  She believes that success does not find us; we must go out tirelessly in pursuit of it and that what she’s looking for and why she’s asking Integral for a loan to buy pots and pans at wholesale.  Marta Lidia has the hope that with hard work she’ll manage to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pots and pans at wholesale.

loans.name: Djumabay

texts.ru:
Джумабай проживает в селе Чалдовар (Панфиловский район, Чуйская область, Кыргызстан) и воспитывает дочь девяти лет. 
Джумабай родился в 1969 году в простой семье фермера.  У отца было небольшое фермерское хозяйство и с детства Джумабай помогал отцу по уходу за скотом и мечтал в будущем иметь свое собственное хозяйство. 
В 1988 году, после окончания школы, Джумабай пошел служить в армию и 1990, вернувшись в родное село и  выучившись на водителя сельхоз техники, устроился в местный колхоз в качестве тракториста - комбайнера. 
Через некоторое время Джумабай женился  и постепенно, получая зарплату, покупал молодняк и выращивал клевер и зерновые, таким образом  приумножая хозяйство. В 2002 году родилась дочь, а  в 2003 году Джумабай смог купить собственный дом для своей семьи.
На данный момент благодаря упорству Джумабая, в хозяйстве у него насчитывается 3 дойных коровы и 22 головы баранов. Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Джумабай обратился в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)на покупку бычков для откорма.    В будущем Джумабай планирует увеличение поголовья скота и мечтает купить внедорожник.
texts.en: Djumabay lives in the Chaldovar village (Panfilovsk district, Chuysk region, Kyrgyzstan) and is raising one nine-year daughter.  Djumabay was born in 1969 into a simple farmer's family.  His father had a small farm, and since childhood, Djumabay helped his father with caring for the livestock and dreamed of having his own farm in the future.  In 1988, after finishing school, Djumabay went to serve in the army.  Upon his return to his native village in 1990, he studied to become a driver of agricultural machinery and was hired at the local collective farm as a tractor/combine driver.  After some time, Djumabay got married and, using his salary, gradually purchased young livestock and grew clover and cereals; thus, expanding his farm.  His daughter was born in 2002, and Djumabay was able to buy his own house for his family in 2003.  Currently, thanks to Djumabay's persistence, his farm contains 3 dairy cows and 22 heads of sheep.  In order to further develop his business, Djumabay requested a loan in the sum of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for the purchase of bulls for fattening up.  In the future, Djumabay plans to increase livestock headcount and dreams of buying an off-road vehicle.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Raihonoi

texts.ru: Райхоной более 30 лет занимается откормом скота, и она имеет богатый опыт в данном бизнесе. Все эти годы она изучила все слабые стороны бизнеса и сейчас без всяких трудностей продолжает свой бизнес. Она замужем и любящая мать троих детей. Её муж агроном и помогает жене в бизнесе. Её любящие внучки всегда помогает ей, и она очень любит их. Ради них она усердно работает и хочет улучшить свое жилищные условия, чтобы они жили в хороших условиях. С этой целью Райхоной запрашивает займ. Займ она планирует использовать для стройки дома. Она заранее благодарна вам за вашу поддержку и поощрения.
texts.en: Raihonoi has been feeding cattle for more than thirty years and she has a rich experience in this business. All these years she learned all the weak spots of the business and now she continues it without any difficulties. She is married and is a loving mother of three children. Her husband is an agronomist and helps her with the business. Her loving granddaughters always help her and she loves them very much. She works diligently for their sake and wants to improve her living conditions so they can live in better environment. With this purpose Raihonoi is asking for a loan. She plans to use the loan to build a house. She is thanking everyone in advance for the support and encouragement.

loans.use: to build a house.

loans.name: Nabangala B Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Nabangala B Group in Western Kenya! Elina is the facilitator of the Nabangala B group. This group joined One Acre Fund in 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program. Elina joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Elina had a very good maize yield harvesting 18 bags on one acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Elina was only able to harvest 10 bags of maize on that land. 

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Elina and her group during Kenya's next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund's integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit, and insurance. 

With income from maize sales Elina will ensure food security and invest in livestock rearing. 

In 2012, the members of Nabangala B group will each plant between ½ and one acre of maize.

loans.use: To buy farming inputs such as seeds and fertilizer at low prices for the 2012 planting season

loans.name: Srey Orn

texts.en:
Srey Orn is 32 years old and married with 3 children who attend school. 

For the last 8 years, she has been farming on her land to earn a living.  Srey Orn also plants cassava and works at other plantations to gain additional income. 

Srey Orn has been with VisionFund for 3 years and is now requesting a loan to cultivate rice on her farmland and to plant cassava trees.  With this loan, she hopes to earn more income to feed her family, to buy necessary household goods and to keep her children in school.

loans.use: to cultivate rice paddy and plant cassava.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: San

texts.en:
San, 37, is married with 4 school aged children.

To earn a living, she has planted cassava and farmed her land for 12 years.  She also works at other plantation to gain additional income. 

This is her fourth loan with VisionFund.  San hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income to feed her family, set aside some savings for the future and her children and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to plant cassava and grow rice paddy.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Manzura

texts.ru: Манзура трудолюбивая и добросовестная женщина. Она замужем и у них трое детей. Она занимается откормом скота более 10 лет и имеет хорошую условию на содержании скота. Она имеет 2 голов коровы и 2 голов овца. Манзура хочет улучшить свое жилищное условия и запрашивает займ для покупки пластики и кафеля для обшивки бани и раздевалки. Она заранее благодарна вам за вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Manzura is a hardworking and honest woman. She is married and has three children. She feeds cattle for more than ten years and has good conditions for keeping the cattle. She has two heads of cows and two heads of sheep. Manzura wants to improve her living conditions and is asking for a loan to buy plastic and tile for plating of the bathhouse and changing room. She is thanking everyone in advance for the help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy plastic and tile.

loans.name: Grace Wangui

texts.en:
Grace used her second loan to buy a bull and two sheep for farming purposes.  It's been profitable ever since, and she has been paying her loan back, and in good time.

This is her third loan.  She plans to use this loan to buy farm inputs and equipment as well as to hire manual labor workers at her farm.

In the future, Grace hopes expand her farm and gain more income so she can improve her family's living standards.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs and equipments.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 32 years old married woman who has three children.  All of them are in school.  

She has sold charcoal in South Sudan for five year. Her husband is a businessman.

Mary requested this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase more charcoal to sell.  She will use her extra income to cover the cost of sending her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Sophary

texts.en:
Sophary is a 31 year-old mother of two children.  Her oldest son is six years old and he attends school.  Her four year old daughter is too young to go to school. 

Sophary has been farming for several years to support her family.  She also plants cassava to raise additional income.  

Sophary hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income to feed her family, set aside some money for the future and to keep her children in school.

loans.use: to cultivate rice paddy and plant cassava.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Marhabo

texts.ru: Мархабо умная и активная женщина. Она замужем и любящая мать троих детей. Она занимается купле- продажей хозяйственными товарами. В основном она продает шампунь, порошок, мыло, парфюмерия и т.д. Жители, которые живут там, часто посещают ее магазин, и она с радостью принимает их. Она всегда привозит хорошие высококачественные товары, чтобы товары понравились клиентам. Мархабо хотела бы получить займ для покупки товаров с целью увлечения товарооборота и расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Marhabo is a smart and active woman.  She is married and is a loving mother of three children.  She is involved in buying and selling household goods.  Marhabo primarily sells shampoo, laundry detergent, soap, perfumes and the like.  Resident, who live in the area, often come to her store, and happily welcomes them.  She always brings in good, high-quality merchandise, so that her customers like the merchandise.  Marhabo wants to obtain a loan for the purchase of merchandise in order to increase goods turnover and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase new merchandise

loans.name: Nabangala A Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Nabangala A Group in Western Kenya! Sarah is the facilitator of the Nabangala group. This  group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Sarah takes care of four children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Sarah had an excellent maize yield harvesting 10 bags on 3/4 acre of land. Before joining One Ace Fund, Sarah was only able to harvest 1.5 bags of maize on 3/4 acre of land. With income from maize sales, Sarah will educate her children, ensure food security and invest in livestock rearing.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Sarah and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February, 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance. In 2012, the members of Nabangala A group will each plant  between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

NB: Rachael Nabangala is funded in Nabangala B group; thus, this reduces the number in this group to three people.

loans.use: to source farming inputs such as seeds and fertilizer at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Benedicta

texts.en:
Benedicta is 40 years old, a widow with five children; Raphael, Kelvin, Irene, Sharon and Japheth.

She owns a retail shop and has been in the business for the past two years.  Benedicta earns a monthly income of KES 10,000.

This is her third loan term with KADET LTD.  She paid her previous loan successfully.  Benedicta will use this loan to purchase and resell sugar, milk, airtime cards and tea leaves.

Benedicta's previous loan enabled her to expand her business and increase her income.  She will use the anticipated profits to open another shop in Kajiado. Her dream is to own a wholesale operation.

loans.use: to add inventory to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more cakes to resell.

loans.name: Butende Tents A Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Butende Tents A Group in Western Kenya! Livingstone is the facilitator of the Butende Tents A group. He is photographed with his group members and their Field Officer on the left. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Livingstone is the father of one child. He joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for his family. In the recent 2011 season, Livingstone had an excellent maize yield harvesting 14 bags on 1 acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Livingstone was only able to harvest 4 bags of maize on 1 acre of land. With income from maize sales, Livingstone will invest in livestock rearing and buy a piece of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Livingstone and his group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance. In 2012, the members of Butende Tents A group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

loans.use: to source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Purity Wamuyu

texts.en:
Purity used her third loan to buy seeds and fertilizer for use on her farm.  She planted and harvested well and it was very profitable.

This is her fourth loan and she plans to use this amount to buy a heifer and fertilizer.

In the future, Purity hopes to expand her farm and to venture into the dairy business so she can increase her income and improve her family's living standard.

loans.use: to buy a heifer and fertilizer.

loans.name: Kudrat

texts.ru: Кудрат занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Он женат. Более 6 лет он выращивает овощи, такие как лук и морковь. Более 6 лет он выращивает сельхозкультур. В этом бизнесе помогает ему его любящая жена и брат. Кудрат хочет улучшить свой уровень жизни и максимизировать свой прибыль. Кудрат хочет приобрести минеральных удобрений и ядохимикатов для переработки земли. А часть займа хочет использовать для покупки горюче смазочные материалы. Он заранее благодарен всем кредиторам за их доброты и милосердие.
texts.en: Kudrat is involved in growing agricultural crops.  He is married.  He has been growing agricultural crops and vegetables, such as onions and carrots, for over six years.  His loving wife and brother help him in this business.  Kudrat wants to improve his quality of life and maximize his profit.  He wants to purchase mineral fertilizers and pesticides for treating the land.  And he wants to use some of the loan to buy fuel-lubricant materials.  Kudrat thanks all of the creditors in advance for their kindness and mercy.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is 40 years old, married and has has four children, all of whom attend school. 

She sells vegetables, like tomatoes and onions in South Sudan.  Betty has been in business for five years.

Betty requested this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase onion for resale.  She will use her extra income to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase onions for resale.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is 42 years of age, married and mother to four children.  Her husband is a framer and she is engaged to the livestock business.  Lorna has been in business for almost 10 years.  She is thankful because by raising piglets, she is able to support her family's needs. 

Lorna would like to see her children attain a high level of education, but her income is not sufficient, due to household expenses.  She believes that she could make her goal come true by using her profits wisely.  

Lorna is asking for a loan of P20,000 to buy feed to help raise her piglets.  She hopes that through her requested loan she could obtain her goal in life.

loans.use: to buy feed to help raise her piglets.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes, 37, is married to David, and they have four children aged 12, 10, 7 and 4 years old. For the past three years she has been selling hardware, earning a monthly income of KES 20,500.

Having repaid her previous loans, Agnes is now requesting her fourth one from KADET LTD. in order to purchase cement, paints and iron sheets. She will reinvest the additional profits back into her business. Her dreams are to have a stable income and educate her children.

loans.use: to buy cement, paints and iron sheets for sale.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert, who is married and blessed with two children, lives in Disimuray, Cauayan City, Isabela, where he has operated his corn farm business for 10 years. His wife manages their hog-raising business for additional income. He is now requesting a loan of 25,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers, seedlings and insecticides for his farm.

In the future, Robert is hoping to grow his business for the betterment of their daily living. He believes that nothing is impossible to a person who has strong faith and strength of mind.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, seedlings and insecticides for his corn farm.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 65 years old.  She is married to James and together they have three children, aged 21, 25 and 19 years old.  She sells firewood and has been in this business for the past three years.  She gets a monthly income of KES 19,000.

This is Ruth's third term loan from KADET LTD.  She paid her previous loans successfully.  She will use the loan amount to purchase wood and firewood to supply to a school.  Her dream is become financially stable.

loans.use: buy firewood to resell

loans.name: Namubila S. H. G. Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Namubila Group in Western Kenya! Janet is the facilitator of the Namubila SHG group. She is in the photograph with her group members. This  group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Janet takes care of six children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for her family. In the recent 2011 season, Janet had an excellent maize yield harvesting 12 bags on 1/2 acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Janet was only able to harvest 1 bag of maize on 1/2 acre of land. With income from maize sales, Janet will educate her children, ensure food security and invest in livestock rearing (goats).

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Janet and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February, 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance. In 2012, the members of Namubila SHG group will each plant  between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

loans.use: to source farming inputs such as seeds and fertilizer at low prices for the 2012 planting season

loans.name: Lolakhon

texts.ru: Лолахон любящий муж и ответственный отец 5 детей. Более трех лет он занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур и откормом скота. Он очень трудолюбивый человек и усердно работает ради счастья своих детей. Лолахон хочет увеличить количество скота, для того чтобы расширить свой бизнес. Он также хочет приобрести минеральных удобрений и ядохимикатов на обработки земли. С этой целью Лолахон запрашивает займ и надеется на вашу поддержку и помощь.
texts.en: Lolakhon is a loving husband and a responsible father of five children.  He has been involved in growing agricultural crops and fattening up livestock for over three years.  He is a very hardworking person, who works persistently to provide happiness for his children.  Lolakhon wants to increase his livestock quantity in order to expand his business.  He also wants to purchase mineral fertilizers and pesticides for treating land.  For this purpose, Lolakhon is requesting this loan and hopes to get your support and help.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: Erdenesuvd

texts.en:
Borrower Erdenesuvd is a 31-year-old single lady who lives with her younger brother in the outer ger district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia, in an area without basic infrastructure. Her brother runs a taxi business while she has been operating a machine and motor oil retail business since 1996. 

First, when she was beginning her business she rented a small stall, but after she graduated her university in 2005, she bought her own stall. Now she has a 2.5 million MNT (Mongolian Tugriks) in working capital. “In winter season, machine and motor oil selling business is very popular, so I need more products.  Unfortunately I haven’t enough money to buy, therefore I am requesting a 1.500.000 MNT loan to purchase more machine oils to sell for upcoming season,” Erdenesuvd said. 

Both of Erdenesuvd and her younger brother help each other and are very hardworking people.

loans.use: buy more machine and motor oil

loans.name: Juakali B Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Juakali B Group in Western Kenya! With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Musabi and his group during Kenya’s next planting season in February, 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

Musabi is the facilitator of the Juakali B group. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program. In 2012, the members of Juakali group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize. In the picture, the field officer is standing on the far left.

Musabi takes care of five children at home. He joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for his family. In the recent 2011 season, Musabi had a very good maize yield harvesting 6 bags on 1/2 acre of land. Before joining One Ace Fund, Musabi was only able to harvest 1/2 bags of maize on 1 acre of land. With income from maize sales, Musabi will educate his children, ensure food security and invest in livestock rearing.

loans.use: to source farming inputs such as seeds and fertilizer at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en: Christopher is married and blessed with four children, all of whom attend school. He has been selling goats for the last five years to bring up his family. He also does farming to increase his income. His potential customers are the local residents. Christopher has employed one person to assist him manage the business. In the next 5 years, he wants to own a butcher shop. He has requested for a loan of 50,000 Kenyan shillings to buy more goats for resale.

loans.use: buy more goats

loans.name: Reina Esperanza

texts.es: Reina Esperanza D. 63 años D. edad, habita en casa propia junto con su esposo D. 63 años y su hijo el cual ya es mayor D. edad. Reina ha trabajado toda su vida para colaborar con la economía D. su hogar y no dejar toda la responsabilidad a su esposo. Es una mujer increíble ya que a pesar D. su avanzada edad sigue luchando y no se da por vencida ya que su sueño es poder mejorar su situación económica. Ella posee una pequeña tiendita y un comedor en su hogar D. residencia el cual es un lugar accesible y muy frecuentado. Reina ha sabido ganarse la confianza D. todos sus vecinos los cuales están muy satisfechos con el servicio que Reina ofrece. Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener  su negocio activo por muchos años y es así como quiere mantenerlos ya que para ella es muy importante tener esta fuente D. ingresos ya que el  salario D. su esposo no cubre todas las necesidades del hogar. Esto ha motivado a Reina a tomar la decisión  D. solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra D. insumos tanto para su tienda como para su comedor. Por tanto el crédito lo invertirá en la compra D. : verduras, cereales, frutas, carnes, huevos, golosinas, bebidas, aceite, etc. todo esto con el objetivo D. mejor el servicio que ofrece D. tal forma que pueda cubrir una mayor demanda que le permita aumentar su nivel D. ingresos y por consecuencia mejorar su calidad D. vida y la D. su familia.
texts.en:
Reina Esperanza, 63, lives in her own house with her 63-year-old husband and her adult son.  Reina has worked her entire life to contribute to the family economy and not leave that responsibility solely on her husband.  She is an unbelievable woman who despite her advanced age continues fighting and does not give up because her dream is to be able to improve her economic situation.

She has a little store and eatery at home that’s quite accessible and visited by many.  Reina has succeeded in gaining the trust of all her neighbors who are very satisfied with the service Reina provides.  With much effort and dedication she’s kept her business active for many years and that’s how she wants to continue to keep it because it’s very important for her to have this source of income because her husband’s salary isn’t quite enough to cover all the household needs.

This is why she’s asking Integral for a loan to buy supplies both for her store and for her eatery.  She will therefore use the loan to buy vegetables, grains, fruit, meats, eggs, snacks, beverages, oil, etc. with the goal in mind of improving the service she offers so that she can cover a larger demand that will lead to increased income and as a result improve her and her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, grains, fruit, meat, eggs, snacks, beverages, oil, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy grocery stocks to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Comprar variedad de ropa y perfumeria

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy sugar, cooking fat and rice

loans.name: Muhabatshoh

texts.ru: Мухабатшох имеет большую семью, его жена и семеро детей. Ему надо усердно работать для обеспечения семьи. 11 лет назад он начал заниматься сельским бизнесом. Он выращивает сельхозпродуктов: лук, морковь и зерно. Он хочет обрабатывать свою землю и получить хороший урожай. Его бизнес трудоемкий и требует ухода. Для этого он хотел бы приобрести минеральных удобрений, ядохимикатов для переработки земли, а также хочет покупать семян и ГСМ. Он заранее благодарен всем за поддержку и милосердие.
texts.en: Muhabatshoh has a large family, consisting of his wife and seven children.  He needs to work hard in order to provide for his family.  Muhabatshoh started his agricultural business 11 years ago.  He grows agricultural products, such as onions, carrots and cereals.  He wants to treat his land and receive a good harvest.  His business requires hard labor and care.  Muhabatshoh wants to buy mineral fertilizers, pesticides for treating land and also wants to buys seeds and fuel-lubricant materials.  He thanks everyone for the support and mercy.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers, pesticides, seeds and fuel-lubricant materials

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en:
Hellen is a 45-year-old a married woman with five children. All of them are in school.  She has been selling clothes for six years in Yei, South Sudan.  Her husband in a business man.

Hellen requested this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase clothes for sale.  She will use her extra income to build a house in the future.

loans.use: buy clothes to resell

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is a hardworking business woman, aged 47. She is married and blessed with two children who are in school. For the last ten years, she has been running a grocery  business to support her family. She also sells used clothes to earn more income.  

Gladys has requested a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings to buy more cabbages for resale. In the next 5 years, she wants to expand her business.

loans.use: buy cabbages to resell

loans.name: Lorena Leticia

texts.es: Lorena Leticia de 37 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposo y sus hijos. Lorena se dedica  a la elaboración y venta de lácteos. Tiene mucho tiempo de dedicarse a esta actividad y gracias a Dios y a su arduo trabajo ha logrado mantenerlo activo por mucho tiempo, el cual es muy importante para ella y su familia ya que es uno de sus principales fuentes de ingresos.  Ella es una mujer ejemplar la cual hace todo lo que esté en sus manos para llevar el pan de cada día a su familia. Es muy conocida en la zona y muchas personas la prefieren por tener siempre los mejores quesos en la zona. Además los precios están al alcance de todos. Su sueño es dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, razón por la cual no se cansa de trabajar ya que para ella su familia lo es todo. Esto la ha motivado a solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de una mesa adecuada para la elaboración de los quesos ya que por el momento no cuenta con un lugar que le permita agilizar la producción. También necesita el crédito para comprar los  materiales necesarios (recipientes, moldes, pastillas, mantas, etc.), para la elaboración de queso, crema, requesón, etc. Todo esto con el fin de mejorar el servicio que da a los clientes ya que de esta manera  podrá mantener su negocio activo por mucho más tiempo y podrá seguir luchando por su sueño. Confía en Dios que tendrá buenos resultados.
texts.en:
Lorena Leticia, 37, lives in her own home with her family group, comprised of her husband and her children.  Lorena works selling dairy products.  She has been doing this work for a long time and thanks to God and to her hard work she has managed to keep it productive for a long time.  This is very important to her and her family since it is one of their main sources of income.  Lorena is an exemplary woman who does everything in her power to feed her family [give her family their daily bread] .

She is very well known in the area and many people prefer her because she always has the best cheese in the area.  Besides, the prices are accessible to everyone.

Her dream is to give her family a better quality of life, the reason she doesn't stop working, since her family is everything to her.

This has motivated her to request this loan from Integral to invest in her business by buying an appropriate table for making cheese, since at the moment she doesn't have a place that allows her to speed up production.  She also needs the loan to buy the necessary materials (containers, molds, rennet tablets, pieces of cloth, etc.) to make cheese, cream, cottage cheese, etc.

The goal of all this is to improve her customer service, since this way she will be able to keep her business productive for much longer and she will be able to continue fighting for her dream.  She trusts in God that she will have good results.

loans.use: to buy a table, containers, molds, rennet tablets, cloth, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy clothes to resell

loans.name: Alaa'

texts.en:
Alaa' is a 27-year-old young man.  He is a Palestinian National Authority employee with a decent salary. He also works as a painter to improve and increase his income. 

Alaa' will marry soon, so he is preparing for his wedding.  He wants to complete paying some of his wedding expenses such as: purchasing furniture, clothes, etc. but the amount of money he has isn't enough, so he needs to take a loan of $1,000 from FATEN. When Alaa' gets the loan, that will enable him to complete paying some of his wedding expenses.  He will feel comfortable and prepare well for this occasion. 

Alaa' is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: pay some of his wedding expenses

loans.name: María Fita

texts.es: María Fita D. 54 años D. edad, habita en casa propia junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposo, hija y nieta. María ha trabajado toda su vida para sacar a delante a su querida familia. Ella se dedica a la venta D. huevos, verduras, dulce D. atado, etc. Tiene 29 años D. dedicarse a esta actividad y gracias a Dios y a su esfuerzo los resultados obtenidos han sido favorables. María es una mujer ejemplar, trabajadora y llena D. sueños. Para ella lo más importante es su querida familia por ella hace todo lo que este a su alcance para mejorar sus condiciones D. vida. Su negocio está ubicado en el mercado D. la cuidad donD. vive. Es una zona muy estratégica y muy visitada en especial el negocio D.  María ya que ella es una mujer carismática, amable y trabajadora. Ha estado pensando mucho en cómo hacer que su negocio florezca  y ha tomado la decisión D.  solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra D. un mayor número D. productos (huevos, verduras, dulce D. atado, etc.), que permitan abarcar a una mayor demanda D. tal manera que sus ventas se vean aumentadas y por consecuencia sus ingresos. Tiene plena confianza que D. esta manera logrará salir adelante y podrá dar  a su familia mejores oportunidades D. vida.
texts.en:
María Fita is 54 years old and she lives in her own home with her family which consists of her husband, daughter and granddaughter. María has worked all her life to raise her beloved family. She sells eggs, vegetables, and dulce D. atado (logs of rock sugar), etc.  María has devoted 29 year to this activity and thanks to God and her efforts the results have been favorable.

María is an exemplary woman; hard working and full of dreams. For her, the most important thing is her beloved family for whom she does everything in her power to improve their living conditions. María's business is located in the market of the city where she lives. It is in a very strategic neighborhood and well visited especially to María's business because she is a charismatic, kind and hardworking woman. 

María has been thinking a lot about how to make her business flourish and has taken the decision to apply for this loan to INTEGRAL to invest in the purchase of more products (eggs, vegetables,logs of rock sugar, etc..)   This loan allows her to cover increased demand so that sales increase and therefore her income increases. María is confident that this way she can move forward and give her family better opportunities.

loans.use: to buy eggs, vegetables, dulce de atado (logs of rock sugar), etc.

loans.name: Hannah

texts.en: Hannah is 32 years old. She is single and blessed with two children who are in school. She describes herself as a hardworking business woman. She has been running a butcher shop for the last two years to support her family. She also practices dairy farming to earn more income. In the next five years, she wants to expand her business. Hannah is requesting a loan of 80,000 KES to buy more cows for slaughtering. Thanks to Faulu Kenya, she has become more financially stable.

loans.use: To buy more cows.

loans.name: Phanice

texts.en:
Phanice is 37 years old, married to Phillemon, and together they have three children ages eleven, nine and five years old. She operates a quarry and has been in the business for the past two years. She gets a monthly income of KES 35,700.

This is her first loan from KADET LTD. She will use the amount to purchase quarrying tools, pay fees, and hire another quarry site.

She will use the anticipated profit to buy food for her family. Her dream is to own a quarry of her own.

loans.use: to purchase quarrying tools.

loans.name: Clara Valentina

texts.es: Clara Valentina D. 55 años D. edad, habita en casa propia junto con su hijo el cual ya es mayor D. edad. Clara posee un salón D. belleza que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado mantener. Tiene muchos años D. dedicarse al negocio y con la ayuda D. Dios todo poderoso ha sabido estar siempre adelante D. la competencia. Clara se caracteriza por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y dedicada a su trabajo, además es muy amable a la hora D. prestar su servicio. Para ella lo más importante son los clientes ya que sabe que D. ellos depenD. el bienestar D. su negocio por lo que trata D. dar el mejor servicio posible. Últimamente ha estado pensando mucho cómo hacer para seguir mejorando su servicio D. tal manera que los clientes siempre estén motivados a solicitar sus servicios. Todo esto la ha hecho reflexionar y tomar la decisión D. solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar productos D. belleza (maquillaje, champo, cremas, lociones, etc.)  y las herramientas necesarias ( peines, planchas, tijeras, secadora, etc.), para poder dar un buen servicio a los clientes D. tal manera que el negocio florezca y siga dando los frutos necesarios para aspirar a una mejor calidad D. vida.
texts.en: Clara Valentina is 55 years old and lives in her own home together with her adult son.  Clara owns a beauty salon that she has managed to keep running with a lot of effort.  She has been in this business for many years and, with the help of almighty God, she has always known how to keep ahead of the competition.  Clara is noted as being a hard-working, responsible woman who is committed to her work.  She is also very kind when she provides her services.  Clara's customers are the most important thing to her as she knows that the well-being of her business depends on them.  For this reason, she tries to proviD. the best possible service.  Lately, Clara has been thinking a lot about how to continue improving her business so that her customers are always keen to request her services.  This has maD. her sit back and think and deciD. to take out this loan from INTEGRAL so that she can buy beauty products (make up, shampoo, creams, lotions, etc.) and the tools she needs (combs, hair straighteners, scissors, hair dryer, etc.) so that she can proviD. her customers with a good service and so that her business will thrive and continue providing the rewards she needs so that she can aspire to a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy make up, shampoo, creams, lotions, combs, hair straighteners, scissors, hair dryer, etc.

loans.name: Jackson

texts.en:
Jackson is 30 years old. He is married to Irene and together they have one child. He sells tea leaves and has been in the business for the past 10 years. He gets a monthly income of KES 8,000.

This is his first loan from KADET LTD. He will use the loan to purchase tea leaves to sell. He will reinvest the profits back in his business. His dream is to buy a plot and build residential houses.

loans.use: to buy more tea leaves to sell

loans.name: Félix  Serafín

texts.es: Félix  Serafín es una persona increíble, habita en casa propia y con muchos esfuerzos y con la ayuda de Dios ha logrado salir adelante. Él realiza reparaciones electrónicas desde hace muchos años. Este negocio es su principal fuente de ingresos por lo que trabaja duramente para siempre estar un paso delante de la competencia y seguir manteniendo su negocio activo. Félix es un hombre carismático, trabajador y emprendedor. Para él lo más importante es que sus clientes estén satisfechos con el trabajo que realiza por lo que cada día se levanta muy temprano para hacer todas las reparaciones posibles con suma delicadeza de tal manera que los clientes no encuentren razón para estar insatisfechos. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para comprar herramientas que le permitan hacer más fácil el trabajo tales como: alambre, cajas térmicas, dados térmicos, etc. de esta manera espera mejorar su situación económica y poder aspirar a una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Félix Serafín is an incredible person.  He lives in his own home and, with a lot of effort and God's help, he has managed to get ahead in life.  He has been providing electronics repairs for many years.  This business is his main source of income and he works hard so that he can always remain one step ahead of the competition and continue keeping his business active.

Félix is a charismatic, hard-working and entrepreneurial man.  The most important thing, as far as he is concerned, is for his customers to be satisfied with the work that he does.  For this reason, he gets up very early every day to make as many repairs as he can, with extreme delicacy, so that his customers can find no reason to be dissatisfied.  He has taken the decision to request this loan from INTEGRAL to buy tools that allow him to do his work more easily such as wire, thermal protection devices, circuit breakers etc.  In this way, he hopes to improve his financial situation and aspire to a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wire, thermal protection devices, circuit breakers, etc.

loans.name: María Edith

texts.es: María Edith D. 52 años D. edad, habita en casa propia junto con su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposo, hijo y nieto. María se caracteriza por ser una  mujer  trabajadora, responsable y dedicada. Ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta D. deliciosas pupusas. Tiene muchos años D. dedicarse al negocio por lo que ya cuenta con muchos clientes fijos. Su negocio está ubicado en un lugar estratégico el cual es muy accesible y transitado. El sueño D. María es ver florecer su negocio por lo que ha tomado la decisión D. solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra D. la materia prima necesaria (maíz, arroz, queso, chicharon, frijoles, gas propano, etc.), que permita cubrir una mayor demanda D. tal modo que sus ventas se vean aumentadas así como su nivel D. ingresos. D. esta manera espera y confía en Dios que su calidad D. vida y la D. su familia mejoraran.
texts.en:
María Edith, age 52, lives in her own house with her family, which consists of her husband, son, and grandson. María describes herself as a hardworking, responsible and dedicated woman. Her business is making and selling delicious pupusas (stuffed tortillas). She has been involved in this business for many years, which is why she already has a lot of established customers. Her business is located in a strategic location which is very accessible and busy.

María’s dream is to see her business flourish. That’s why she maD. the decision to apply for this loan from INTEGRAL. She will invest the loan in her business by purchasing basic materials (corn, rice, cheese, pork rinds, beans, propane gas, etc.) that will allow her to meet a greater demand so that her sales increase and, along with this, the level of her income. In this way she hopes, God willing, that the quality of life of her and her family improves.

loans.use: to buy corn, rice, cheese, pork rinds, beans, propane gas, etc.

loans.name: Gibson

texts.en: Gibson is married and blessed with five children. For the last ten years, he has been quarrying to make a living. He also does farming to earn more income. Gibson has employed two people to help him to manage the business. In the next five years, he plans to establish a wholesale business. He has requested a loan of 30,000 Kenya shillings to buy a piece of land for his business.

loans.use: to buy a piece of land for his business.

loans.name: Nuy's Group

texts.en: Nuy is 46 years old, divorced and has four children. Her two youngest daughters are still in school. She is a farmer and has been farming on her farmland for 30 years.
